name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
desc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turn(s). While the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases their SPD by 6% and all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.
